title: David Gilmour - Remember That Night (resequenced by }{eywood)
description:
David Gilmour
Remember That Night
resequenced by }{eywood

This is a stereo rip of the DVD audio. What I've done here is pretty simple. I took all the songs that were cut out of the show and put on disc two of the DVD and put them back in sequence. Not as fancy as my previous uploads, but I felt it had to be done. This does not contain any of the Mermaid Theatre, Abbey Road or AOL stuff. I consider those separate entities altogether. It does have a megamix I made of the DVD menu soundscapes as an added bonus.

02 Breathe
03 Time
04 Breathe (reprise) 
05 Castellorizon

07 The Blue

09 This Heaven

21 Dominoes
22 High Hopes
23 Echoes
24 Wish You Were Here
25 Find the Cost of Freedom 
26 Arnold Layne (w/ David Bowie)

28 Arnold Layne (Rick vocal)
